summary: Add project name to dashboard title/header and GitHub icon link — fixes #2 and #3
context: GitHub issues #2 and #3 requested: (1) showing the tracked project name in the dashboard so users can distinguish multiple dashboards, and (2) a GitHub icon link in the header.
rationale: Project name is already available via path.basename(projectRoot) in api-routes.ts. Adding it to the /api/status response and rendering it in the header h1 + page title is the minimal change. GitHub icon uses the standard octicon SVG inline to avoid extra dependencies.

alternatives.option: Add a separate /api/config endpoint for project metadata
alternatives.reason_rejected: Over-engineering for a single field — project_name fits naturally in the existing /api/status response
